atk-abh03a37:2_3: tasmā atthi kiñci saṁyojanaṁ appahāya parinibbāna’’nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a37:2_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:5_2: Tattha yasmā arahā sativepullappatto parinibbāyantopi sato sampajānova parinibbāti,
atk-abh03a37:5_3: tasmā kusalacitto parinibbāyatīti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a37:5_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:5_5: Atha naṁ yasmā kusalacitto nāma puññābhisaṅkhārābhisaṅkharaṇādivasena hoti,
atk-abh03a37:5_8: Sato sampajānoti idaṁ javanakkhaṇe kiriyasatisampajaññānaṁ vasena asammohamaraṇadīpanatthaṁ vuttaṁ, na kusalacittadīpanatthaṁ. Tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a37:8_1: Tattha bhagavā catutthajjhāne ṭhito parinibbāyīti sallakkhetvā ‘‘arahā āneñje ṭhito parinibbāyatī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a37:8_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Pakaticitteti bhavaṅgacitte.
atk-abh03a37:8_4: Sabbe hi saññino sattā bhavaṅgacitte ṭhatvā bhavaṅgapariyosānena cuticittena kālaṁ karonti.
atk-abh03a37:8_5: Iti naṁ iminā atthena codetuṁ evamāha.
atk-abh03a37:8_6: Tattha kiñcāpi catuvokārabhave arahato pakaticittampi āneñjaṁ hoti,
atk-abh03a37:8_8: Tasmā no ca vata re vattabbeti āha. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a37:11_2: Tattha atītabhave sotāpannaṁ mātukucchiyaṁ vasitvā nikkhantaṁ disvā ‘‘atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammābhisamayo’’ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a37:11_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:11_6: dhammābhisamayassa kāraṇehi dhammadesanādīhi bhavitabba’’nti codetuṁ atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a37:11_11: kammaṭṭhānapariggāhakānaṁ satisampajaññānaṁ abhāvā muṭṭhassati asampajāno nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a37:14_2: Tattha acirajātānaṁ pana sotāpannānaṁ arahattappattiṁ suppavāsāya ca upāsikāya sattavassikaṁ gabbhaṁ disvā ‘‘atthi gabbhaseyyāya arahattappattī’’ti ca supine ākāsagamanādīni disvā ‘‘atthi dhammābhisamayo’’ti ca ‘‘atthi tattha arahattappattī’’ti ca idhāpi yesaṁ laddhiyo, seyyathāpi tesaññeva;
atk-abh03a37:14_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:17_1: Idāni abyākatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘atthesā, bhikkhave, cetanā,
atk-abh03a37:17_3: 235) vacanato ‘‘sabbaṁ supinagatassa cittaṁ abyākata’’nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a37:17_5: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:17_7: Supinagatassa cittaṁ abbohārikanti idaṁ āpattiṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a37:17_8: Supinagatassa hi pāṇātipātādivasena kiñcāpi akusalacittaṁ pavattati,
atk-abh03a37:17_9: vatthuvikopanaṁ pana natthīti na sakkā tattha āpattiṁ paññapetuṁ.
atk-abh03a37:17_10: Iminā kāraṇena taṁ abbohārikaṁ, na abyākatattāti.
atk-abh03a37:20_3: na koci muhuttampi ṭhatvā āsevanapaccayaṁ āsevati nāma.
atk-abh03a37:20_5: Āsevanapaccayatāya uppannaṁ pana na kiñci atthīti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva;
atk-abh03a37:20_6: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:20_7: Atha naṁ suttavaseneva paññāpetuṁ nanu vuttaṁ bhagavatā pāṇātipātotiādi ābhataṁ. Taṁ sabbaṁ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a37:23_1: Tattha yasmā sabbasaṅkhatadhammā aniccā, tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāyeva.
atk-abh03a37:23_2: Samānāya hi aniccatāya eko lahuṁ bhijjati,
atk-abh03a37:23_3: eko cirenāti ko ettha niyāmoti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a37:23_5: te sandhāya ekacittakkhaṇikāti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:23_6: Citte mahāpathavītiādīsu tesaṁ tathā saṇṭhānaṁ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a37:23_8: cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhuviññāṇādīhi saddhiṁyeva uppajjitvā nirujjheyyu’’nti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a37:23_9: Itaro pana antomātukucchigatassa viññāṇuppattiṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati ,
atk-abh03a37:23_10: pavattaṁ sandhāya laddhivasena paṭijānāti. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a37:23_11: Tena hi ekacittakkhaṇikāti yasmā niccā na honti,
atk-abh03a37:23_12: tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāti attano ruciyā kāraṇaṁ vadati. Taṁ avuttasadisamevāti.
